about_the_game:
Embark on your first steps into the untamed world of Primal Planet with this demo!

Set on a mysterious alien planet, you’ll get an early look at the survival mechanics and vibrant landscapes that await in the full game. This is just the beginning of your journey—a glimpse of what’s to come as you learn to thrive in an unfamiliar environment.

Demo features:

  • A Glimpse of the Story: Discover the beginning of a touching narrative as you follow a cave dweller fighting to protect his family from looming threats.

  • First Steps into Survival: Test your skills with limited resources, crafting, and combat. With each step, you’ll find new ways to flourish in this hostile world.

  • Exploring the Early Biomes: Experience a segment of the diverse biomes of Primal Planet, each with its own challenges, resources, and creatures.

  • A Taste of the Core Gameplay: Get a first-hand look at the resource management, exploration, and strategic decision-making at the heart of the game.

  • Dynamic Day/Night Cycle: Watch as the planet’s atmosphere transforms with the passing of time. The serene glow of daylight gives way to the calm of the night, offering new perspectives and peaceful moments to enjoy. Don’t wake up the sleeping dinos!

Shape the Future

Your feedback is vital as I continue to develop Primal Planet. Share your experiences, suggestions, and thoughts to help me improve the game!

Don’t forget to follow to stay informed about future updates and announcements as the game evolves.

name: Primal Planet Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 560 or better
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Step into the untamed wilderness of the Primal Planet Demo – a sneak peek into the world of primeval predators, savage tribes and... ancient aliens!
